'''Mythcon 5''' was the fifth annual [[Mythopoeic Society]] conference. 

*'''Theme:''' "The MabinogiCon": Celtic and Welsh Influence in Mythopoeic Literature
*'''Guests of Honor:''' Evangeline Walton (fantasy author) and Kathryn Lindskoog (Lewis scholar)
*'''Chairman:''' [[Glen GoodKnight]]
